author: jmarino
msg: remove need for system binding and use local binding instead as the latter supports wire optimization; move auto-assignment of local binding to services and references up to builder registry as part of system binding removal; remove AtomicComponent specialization in wire optimization with introduction of Component.isOptimizable()

author: evenisse
msg: [CONTINUUM-1136] Relying on default charset while backing up continuum store

author: bhupendrab
msg: This script checks if all the messages were sent received back successfully.  ServiceRequestingClient.java and ServiceProvidingClient.java modified to add a message identifier to match the request and response message. log4j file modified to create a log file

author: tripod
msg: JCR-697: .war distribution should be configurable, prompting you to setup JNDI with the Repository Home and Config locations.
